dialogue.intro: Namaste bhaiya. Advaya FM Elite family mein aapka swagat hai. Aaj se aap sirf ek driver nahi, ek 'Corporate Pilot' hain. Professionalism aapki uniform se shuru hoti hai.
dialogue.body_1: Yaad rakhiye, Broadcom ke executives ke liye punctuality sabse zaroori hai. Jab aap waqt par hote hain, tab aap unka bharosa jeet-te hain.
dialogue.body_2: Gaadi ke andar ka mahol hamesha silent aur comfortable hona chahiye. Aapki pehchaan aapke kaam se hai. Let's build the Elite standard together.
dialogue.closing: Aapka din shubh ho, Pilot. Hamesha savdhan rahein.

dialogue.intro: Namaste. Mobile app dushman nahi, dost hai. Aaj hum 'Gulgul' interface ko samajhenge jo aapki kamayi aur rasta dono asaan banayega.
dialogue.body_1: Har trip se pehle app check karein. Sahi rasta chunne se fuel bachega aur Broadcom ke passengers waqt par pahunchenge.
dialogue.body_2: Technology ka sahi istemal hi ek modern driver ko 'Elite Pilot' banata hai. Sahi rasta aur sahi kamaayi, dono aapki mutthi mein.

dialogue.intro: Bhaiya, izzat sabse badi daulat hai. Advaya mein hum sabki dignity ki hifazat karte hain. Mahilaon ki suraksha aur samman hi humara dharma hai.
dialogue.body_1: Professional distance banaye rakhein. Agar aapko kuch bhi galat dikhe, toh 'Plan Hammer' ka istemal karein. System Vajra aapke saath hai.
dialogue.body_2: Aapka vyavhar hi Broadcom mein humare standards ko define karta hai. Respect is non-negotiable.

dialogue.intro: Gaadi ki hifazat, khud ki hifazat. Ek Elite Pilot apni machine ko hamesha fit rakhta hai.
dialogue.body_1: Rozana sirf 5 minute ka checkup aapko bade khatre se bachayega. Tire pressure aur oil level hamesha check karein.
dialogue.body_2: Brake pads aur fluid levels ki Vajra inspection zaroori hai. Yaad rakhiye, aapki machine hi aapki livelihood hai. Keep it sharp.
dialogue.closing: Surakshit chalne ke liye tyayar rahein.

dialogue.intro: Road par hamesha surprises hote hain. Savdhani hi aapka sabse bada insurance hai. Har mod par taiyar rahiye.
dialogue.body_1: Hazard detection ka matlab hai khatre ko pehle se pehchanna. Jab aap narrow lanes mein hote hain, tab focus double rakhiye.
dialogue.body_2: Emergency braking tab asaan hoti hai jab aap control mein hon. POV viewer mein in hazards ko pehchanne ki practice karein.
dialogue.closing: Soch samajh kar chalein, hamesha bachein.

dialogue.intro: Bangalore traffic ek sabr ka imtihan hai. Lane discipline hi shehar ki raftaar hai. Letâ€™s pass it every day.
dialogue.body_1: Bina matlab ke horn nahi, bina wajah lane change nahi. Mirrors ka sahi istemal hi aapko bheed mein alag banata hai.
dialogue.body_2: Indicators ka waqt par istemal karein. Top-down view mein dekhiye kaise ek professional traffic mein merge hota hai.

dialogue.intro: Raat ke andhere mein aapki aankhein aur chamakni chahiye. Focus up, glare down.
dialogue.body_1: Baarish aur andhere mein glares se bachein. Anti-glare mirror ki settings hamesha sahi rakhein.
dialogue.body_2: Geeli sadkon par hydroplaning ka darr rehta hai. Raftar kam rakhein aur dashboard glow par nazar rakhein.
dialogue.closing: Raat ka safar, zimmedari ka safar.

dialogue.intro: Mushkil waqt mein ghabrana nahi, lead karna hai. Aap ek Elite protector hain.
dialogue.body_1: Crisis mein passengers aapki taraf dekhte hain. Fire extinguisher ka sahi istemal aur emergency exits ki jankari hona lazmi hai.
dialogue.body_2: First aid aur fire safety mein hamesha lead karein. Aapki training hi logon ki jaan bacha sakti hai.
dialogue.closing: Aapka hausla hi sabki jeet hai. Jai Hind.
